name: undercover

description: ai-generated personalized cover letters from job description, direct into your downloads folder.
author: thisisadityapatel

commands.name: undercover
commands.title: undercover
commands.description: ai-generated personalized cover letters from job description, direct into your downloads folder.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
